annonsrubrik: OT Security Engineer to Tetra Pak
annonstext:
In the role as Operational Technology Security Engineer at Tetra Pak, the world's leading company in process and packaging solutions for food, you work with skilled and passionate colleagues with great pride in protecting food and the planet. If that sounds great to you, this might be a perfect opportunity!

ABOUT THE ROLE

As part of Integration Supply Chain in Additional Materials at Tetra Pak you will participate in defining and securing our Operational Technology (OT) infrastructure. Within our OT security team, you will join an interesting journey contributing to a stronger integration and collaboration between development and Additional Materials production.

In this role you take part of the activities in the OT Security team, which means to support new projects to include OT Security requirements and comply with OT Security standards. It means support for factories, users and suppliers with automation related OT security issues, and verification/testing/ implementation and changes to the solutions. Training on OT Security and Remote Access is covered as well as OT Security Factory Audits, also integration of OT in Security Operations Center/Information Security Incident Response Team processes.

WHO ARE YOU?

To be successful in this position you have several years’ experience in automation and production, as well as a couple of years of working experience in OT Security/Industrial security. You have a basic understanding of IT networks/SCADA systems and computer software configuration, system hardening, industrial network segmentation and/or client security controls. You are either educated or have corresponding experience within automation. To fit with the team, you enjoy collaboration as well as align with agreed ways of working.

HOW TO APPLY

This recruitment process is a collaboration with Wise IT. For questions about the role please contact recruiter FIRSTNAME LASTNAME, and welcome with your application via our web form, not by mail.

ABOUT TETRA PAK

At Tetra Pak we touch millions of lives every day, ensuring better nutrition and healthier lifestyles through safe packaging and food processing solutions. Guided by our global brand promise, PROTECTS WHAT´S GOOD, we strive to make a difference by protecting food, people and our futures. To do this we need more than smart technology. We are looking for world-class engineering and scientific talent. People like you, who want to work with people like us.
